issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
h2. Problem

We have some users reporting problem when entering text in TextFields when using a Sony Xperia phone. The users have tried both with and without the T9 keyboard . Since we have not been able to find that phone to try on we have not been able to reproduce this issue.

One user report goes like this

"It seems to take only one letter per key. It is not possible to erase, change lines or use the suggested words."

Another user report:

"The first letter is correct but incorrect letters popup. The word suggestions are not accessible. It is also not possible to delete letters."

h2. Test case

This goes for all textfields, no test case required.

h2. Logs

See attached image (ok, not perfect image, but it is difficult to show this without creating a movie).
fields.summary: Keyboard input is messed up on Xperia active (ST17i) (at least)
fields.environment: Android (we have tried sdks between 11 and 18), Xperia active (ST17i), Titanium SDK 3.1.X + Titanium SDK 3.2.0

comments.body:
[~karl.n] We tried to reproduce this issue on following two Sony Xperia devices but we have not been able to reproduce this issue. Please provide us a complete test case that reproduces this issue.

1.Sony Xperia LT26i
2.Sony Xperia ST25i

We do not have access to a Sony Xperia ST17i device.
Ok, big thanks anyway for putting some effort into this!
